job_description:
About WELL

WELL is an innovative technology enabled healthcare company whose overarching objective is to positively impact health outcomes by leveraging technology to empower and support healthcare practitioners and their patients.

WELL’s practitioner enablement platform includes comprehensive end to end practice management tools inclusive of virtual care and digital patient engagement capabilities as well as Electronic Medical Records (EMR), Revenue Cycle Management (RCM) and data protection services. WELL uses this platform to power healthcare practitioners both inside and outside of WELL’s own omni-channel patient services offerings.

WELL owns and operates Canada's largest network of outpatient medical clinics serving primary and specialized healthcare services and is the provider of a leading multi-national multi-disciplinary telehealth offering. WELL is publicly traded on the Toronto Stock Exchange under the symbol "WELL". To learn more about the company, please visit: ww.well.company .

About The Team

The WELL EMR Group is responsible for the development and support of the OSCAR platform, a leading Electronic Medical Record (EMR) software in Canada that supports thousands of providers and millions of Canada patients across the country. Primarily located in the greater Toronto area and the greater Vancouver area, the team currently works remotely due to COVID with expectations to remain remote for the near future. We are a remote first with hybrid support where desired.

About The Position

Reporting to the Technical Lead Manager, the Senior Developer plays a significant role in turning technical requirements into working software. The Senior Developer is responsible for implementing the most difficult of software challenges and will be called upon to deliver under tight timelines and in tough technical domains.

Working alongside the rest of your team, the Senior Developer is responsible for performing code review of other team members and will be a major day to day contributor to the code base.

You will, as needed, be called upon for providing “last line of defense” to the technical support team for debugging the most challenging and difficult to diagnose customer issues. The Senior Developer will be able to execute software tasks with only modest need for oversight from the technical leads and other senior developers. As a Senior Developer, you will be an enabler, ensuring that less experienced developers are supported, encouraged and coached to success.

This is an exciting opportunity to play a role in shaping health care technology that supports tens of thousand of health care providers and millions of Canadians just like yourself.

This position will join a team located in the EST time zone and will be remote with a hybrid option.

Mission

Provide significant development capabilities to the OSCAR Pro development team through software development practices in both front and back-end.

OutcomesDeliver Attachment Manager

Play a significant role in developing the software for the OSCAR Pro Attachment Manager feature, significantly improving the OSCAR Pro message attachment capabilities in the OSCAR Pro application.

Improve the Quality and Depth Of Code Reviews

Provide meaningful guidance through the process of code reviews. Raise the code review bar while helping junior developers improve their software development practices and skills. Drive improved testing practices through unit testing and end to end test writing in all development work accomplished.

Drive Best Practices By Example

Provide leadership to the rest of the team through the development of clean, well tested and well documented software. Lead by example. Push where needed. Excel in all aspects of software delivery and be a shining example to the rest of the team.

About You

You have a deep understanding of Java, JavaScript, MySQL, Tomcat, Linux, git and tools such as JIRA and Bitbucket. You are comfortable documenting architecture and software from the micro to macro scale and can easily communicate at different levels as required by stakeholders. You are able to easily translate large challenges into smaller, actionable tasks and execute on them with ease.

You understand the value of automated tests, DevOps, agile practices and methodologies and deliver full value to your projects.

Qualities

Humble. Balance your deep experience in software development with a humility that provides support for those around you to ask questions with comfort and ease. Don’t rush to dismiss. Provide space for all ideas. Promote the best ideas without ego.
Productive. Exhibit a daily drive to results that is thoughtful but values action over perfection.
Professional. Demonstrate professionalism in all aspects of software development. Does not cut corners but also doesn’t die on hills of purity and process.
Smart. The role requires individuals that have a generally high level of intelligence and a mental toughness for solving problems.
Communicator. Able to communicate clearly in a structured and thoughtful fashion. Provides context (background) and clarity (details) as required and appropriately. Direct.
Coaching. Is eager to help others. Loves to see the team grow and improve. Recognizes raised hands and provides support with comfort.
Skills

Java. Strong abilities in Java, JUnit, Spring, Hibernate.
Git. Comfortable with Git and the Gitflow branching model.
SQL. Comfortable understanding how data is retrieves and stored in MySQL
Unit Testing. You are strong in unit testing practices. JUnit is a good friend you couldn’t imagine living without.
Angular You are comfortable taking on front end tasks in Angular following established practices and conventions as well as leading with new standards where needed.

Nice to have

Experience with Docker and containers
Scripting with Python
Experience with application security and code quality tools
